attributes.action: Stop the launch of vaccine passports in the UK
attributes.additional_details: It infringes people’s human rights, religion and beliefs. Singles out certain people and their privacy. Healthcare is a choice, if others are vaccinated they’re safe, we should choose if we wish to take it or not
attributes.background: Stop vaccine passports. Vaccination is a personal choice, allow people to live life freely again.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action:

Outlaw discrimination against those who do not get a Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
